name: Thunder Hawk
overview: Decent if tough, (probably) unreleased vertically scrolling shooter set to be published in 1988 by Atlantis Software Ltd. Musician: Mark Tait, Graphician: Harjinder Rai and Programmer: Steve Dunn, who did a number of games on the C64, including Call Me Psycho. Passwords are given to help you return to levels you have achieved earlier so you don't have to retrace ALL your steps.
